name: Easy Select and Share
author: Solwin infotech

sections.description:
Easy Select and Share plugin comes with 3 most popular social media sites support and 10+ preset layouts. You can create any design which looks great with your site design within one click.

Documentation: Easy Select and Share Documentation Link

PRO Demo: https://selectandshare.solwininfotech.com/

Easy Select and Share Plugin Features
3 Social Networks – It supports Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter.
10+ preset layouts – Plugin provide 10+ different layouts.
Custom Post Type supports including page, post and all
2 types of social media buttons selection available ( Icon, Image )
2 types of text share option
4 Positions available for social media
Fully Customize Admin Interface
Fully Responsive
Cross Browser Compatibility
Unlimited colors & design
Clean and detailed code
No Expert Needed
Custom CSS
Translation Ready
Premium Support
Well Documented

Easy Select and Share PRO Features:

14+ Social Networks – It supports Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Tumblr, Email, Skype, Vk, Whatsapp, Xing, Pinterest, Blogger, Buffer, Reddit, Wikipedia, Copy.
20+ preset layouts – Plugin provide 20+ different layouts.
Custom Post Type supports including page, post and all
Custom taxonomy terms supports including category, tags and all.
2 types of social media buttons selection available ( Icon, Image, Icon + Text, Text )
2 types of text share option
4 Positions available for social media
Shortcode for click to tweet
Inline Share option
Gutenberg click to Share
Fully Customize Admin Interface
Fully Responsive
Cross Browser Compatibility
Unlimited colors & design
Clean and detailed code
No Expert Needed
Custom CSS
Translation Ready
Premium Support
Well Documented

Upgrade to PRO!

Check out comparison table
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins > Add New.
  2. Click on Upload Plugin and browse and select easy-select-and-share.zip then click on Install Now.
  3. To activate Easy Select and Share, Click on Activate link.
  4. After plugin activation, move on Easy Select and Share plugin page.
sections.faq:
Will Easy Select and Share work with my theme?

Yes, Easy Select and Share will work with any WordPress setup. If you are facing any compatibility issue with Easy Select and Share plugin then please contact us at Support Forum or support.solwininfotech.com.
